item.title: Thunderstorm chances are high this weekend
item.description: Rain chances are still high this weekend

item.title: Body found in pond along I-75 near where missing teen was last seen
item.description: The sheriff's office says a decomposing body was found in a retention pond near I-75 and State Road 70.

item.title: Farmer’s Markets Saturday Forecast
item.description: An isolated shower is possible in the morning, with widespread thunderstorms developing for the afternoon

item.title: New alert system coming to Bradenton Beach
item.description: Perhaps the most important feature about this new system? They won’t over-notify you.

item.title: Saturday Afternoon and Evening Forecast
item.description: Most storms will die down after sunset (8:13 PM)

item.title: HIGH ALERT: Police hunting for wanted felon
item.description: Venice Police are on the hunt for a wanted felon, and they say the search has been underway all night.

item.title: Beach & Boating Forecast Saturday
item.description: On Thursday and Friday, Siesta Key Beach reported some jellyfish

item.title: Officer killed in CDC shooting was a former Marine and father of 2
item.description: David Rose, a 33-year-old DeKalb County police officer, was killed on Aug. 8 while responding to a shooting on Emory University’s Atlanta campus.

item.title: Afternoon storms developing Saturday and Sunday
item.description: We have a Marginal Risk (at least 5%) for flooding or ponding of water with areas of heavy rain possible with our weekend afternoon storms

item.title: FHP: Two teens killed, two hospitalized after Manatee County crash
item.description: The crash killed the driver and a 19-year-old man from Parrish.
